message: Let's start fair. I'll take a slightly larger share, but we both get a good amount to begin with.
Your share loses value quickly Alice. Let's make a deal now - this is a good offer for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. Let's split the difference from your last offer.
This is a fair offer Alice. Every round that passes hurts you more than me. Don't get greedy!
